name: Coral Capitalism
description:
Our game is set in the dystopian future of 2020, where, because of global warming, “The Great Barrier Reef” has completely died out. Now no one wants to visit Australia anymore. So in an attempt to save the failing tourism, the country’s politicians have hired you to recreate the reef.

Made By:

Andreas Holmgaard - Programming

Nicolai Brobak - Programming

Mads Skovbakke - Art

Kathrine Frantzen - Art

Jonas Kappel - Sound

Edwon - Visual Programming
